translations: n．奇妙装置，复杂的机械装置：通常指看起来奇怪、复杂或难以理解的机械装置。

sentences.sentence: Clockwork logic — the logic of the machines — will only build simple contraptions.
sentences.translation: 钟表般的精确逻辑——也即机械的逻辑——只能用来建造简单的装置。

sentences.sentence: They routinely do battle with terrifying contraptions, chemicals, sharp objects and irons capable of scalding.
sentences.translation: 她们经常与让人害怕的新发明、化学药品、尖锐的东西和滚烫的铁器作斗争。

sentences.sentence: Dr Church is working on making ribosomes—complex contraptions with dozens of protein and RNA components—from scratch.
sentences.translation: 切奇在研究制造核糖体——由许多蛋白质和RNA组成的复杂设计——从零开始。
